channel.title: thor on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in thor on Will Schenk

item.title: Making a command line utility with gems and thor
item.description: Some scripts work well because they are self contained and don’t have a lot of dependancies, like the hosts on your network tracker. Others scripts have more code than fits into a single file multiple options and switches have an extensive set of dependancies And on those cases, its better to make a gem and use thor Hammer of the Gods Lets figure out how to make some command line tools and package them up so that they can be shared and used by other people.
